mapper.select: select * from ph_phone where manufacture=#{manufacture} order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into ph_phone(no, name, image, manufacture, release_date) values(ph_phone_seq.nextval,#{name},#{image},#{manufacture},#{release_date})
insert into ph_color(no, color, image) values(#{no}, #{color}, #{image})
insert into ph_capacity(no, capacity, release_price) values(#{no}, #{capacity}, #{release_price})
insert into spec_processor(no, cpu_Speed, cpu_type) values(#{no}, #{cpu_Speed}, #{cpu_type})
insert into spec_display(no, size_main, resoluation_main, type_main, color_depth_main, s_pen) values(#{no}, #{size_main}, #{resoluation_main}, #{type_main}, #{color_depth_main}, #{s_pen})

insert into spec_camera(no, video_resoluation, maincamera_pixel, maincamera_aperture, frontcamera_pixel, frontcamera_aperture, maincamera_flash, maincamera_autofocus, camera_detail) values(#{no}, #{video_resoluation}, #{maincamera_pixel}, #{maincamera_aperture}, #{frontcamera_pixel}, #{frontcamera_aperture} ,#{maincamera_flash}, #{maincamera_autofocus}, #{camera_detail})
insert into spec_memory(no, ramsize, romsize, usable_memory, outer_memory) values(#{no}, #{ramsize}, #{romsize}, #{usable_memory}, #{outer_memory})

insert into spec_network(no, type_of_sim_slot, gsm_2g, umts_3g, td_scdma_3g, fdd_lte_4g, tdd_lte_4g) values(#{no}, #{type_of_sim_slot}, #{gsm_2g}, #{umts_3g}, #{td_scdma_3g}, #{fdd_lte_4g}, #{tdd_lte_4g})

insert into spec_connect(no, ant, usb_version, location, ear_adapter, mhl, wifi_direct, wifi, bluetooth_version, nfc, bluetooth_profile, pcsynk) values(#{no}, #{ant}, #{usb_version}, #{location}, #{ear_adapter}, #{mhl}, #{wifi_direct}, #{wifi}, #{bluetooth_version}, #{nfc}, #{bluetooth_profile}, #{pcsynk})
insert into spec_specifications(no, os, color, form, phone_size, weight, sensor) values(#{no}, #{os}, #{color}, #{form}, #{phone_size}, #{weight}, #{sensor})

insert into spec_battery(no, internet_use_3g, internet_use_lte, internet_use_wifi, video_play, battery_capacity, change_possible, audio_play,audio_play_ondisplay , continuous_call) values(#{no}, #{internet_use_3g}, #{internet_use_lte}, #{internet_use_wifi}, #{video_play}, #{battery_capacity}, #{change_possible}, #{audio_play}, #{audio_play_ondisplay}, #{continuous_call})
insert into spec_audio(no, video_format, video_resoluation, audio_format, video_detail, facetime) values(#{no}, #{video_format}, #{video_resoluation}, #{audio_format}, #{video_detail}, #{facetime})
insert into spec_service(no, gear_support, svoice, mobiletv, siri, waterproof) values(#{no}, #{gear_support}, #{svoice}, #{mobiletv}, #{siri}, #{waterproof})
mapper.update: update ph_capacity set capacity=#{capacity}, release_price=#{release_price} where no=#{no}
update spec_processor set cpu_Speed=#{cpu_Speed}, cpu_type=#{cpu_type} where no=#{no}
